title: ‘Swatting hoax’ puts Milford High School on lockdown
author: Abby Patkin
bullets: Crime A 16-year-old boy is suspected of calling in the report of a student with a gun, according to police.

By Abby Patkin December 8, 2025 | 2:19 PM 1 minute to read A Massachusetts high school went on lockdown Monday morning after authorities received a hoax report of a student in the bathroom with a gun, officials said.
Although the report was unverified, Milford High School was under a shelter-in-place order while police swept the building “out of an abundance of caution,” according to school officials.
